scripts.dev:force: ./scripts/py -m scripts.update_feeds --feeds feeds.md --cache cache --force && ./scripts/py -m scripts.build_site --feeds feeds.md --cache cache --base-path / && AP_FEEDS=feeds.md AP_CACHE=cache vite --config vite.config.js
scripts.dev:force:actualplays: ./scripts/py -m scripts.update_feeds --feeds feeds.actualplays.md --cache cache.actualplays --force && ./scripts/py -m scripts.build_site --feeds feeds.actualplays.md --cache cache.actualplays --base-path / && AP_FEEDS=feeds.actualplays.md AP_CACHE=cache.actualplays vite --config vite.config.js
scripts.dev:force:other: ./scripts/py -m scripts.update_feeds --feeds feeds.other.md --cache cache.other --force && ./scripts/py -m scripts.build_site --feeds feeds.other.md --cache cache.other --base-path / && AP_FEEDS=feeds.other.md AP_CACHE=cache.other vite --config vite.config.js
